coreAttributes.authorTag: An inscription written in crayon underneath the bottle reads 'Shaken not stirred by Tasty's Secret Priest Sauce LLC'
coreAttributes.name: Banana Milkshake
coreAttributes.description: A frosty mug-shaped bottle of banana milkshake. The label on the bottle depicts a lithely muscled monkey-boy in a speedo and sunglasses nearly falling off his face, hanging by his tail from a palm tree and drinking from the bottle with a straw while grinning and winking at the consumer.
coreAttributes.applyEffects:
[##npc.incrementHealth(npc.getAttributeValue(ATTRIBUTE_HEALTH_MAXIMUM)/20)]

A powerful wave of arcane energy washes over [npc.name]...

[#npc.addPotionEffect(ATTRIBUTE_MAJOR_PHYSIQUE, 1)]

useDescriptions.selfUse: After first popping the cap, [npc.name] [npc.verb(bring)] the bottle of Banana Milkshake up to [npc.her] [npc.mouth]. A curiously sweet smell of banana wafts from the opening, and as [npc.she] [npc.verb(tilt)] [npc.her] head back and [npc.verb(start)] drinking the frosty concoction, [npc.she] [npc.verb(feel)] exultingly giggly.
